attributes.action: BAN the  all political parties from using the union flag or any other national flag in their logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Political parties using the union flag or other national flag  in their logo to represent themselves is a abuse of our cherished flag allowing its use allows it meaning to be distorted and turns it into a symbol of that parties views.

If these views happen to be  extreme or racist views, the flag is seen to represent these. 

This cannot be right and should be banned in order to protect the meaning and integrity of our flag.
